library.description: TSM is a a collection of vector and matrix classes written in Microsoft's new JavaScript superset TypeScript, which compiles to plain JavaScript.
library.name: TSM

library.description:
MOUT is a collection of modular JavaScript utilities that can be used in the browser as AMD modules or on node.js. - modules are converted into node.js format during npm publish using nodefy - It provides many helper methods similar to those found on other languages standard libraries (ie. Python, Ruby, PHP)

The biggest difference between other existing solutions is that you can choose to load only the modules/functions that you need, no extra overhead or complex build systems required. It also provides a clean and consitent API and normalizes the behavior across multiple browsers/environments. All batteries included.
library.name: mout

library.description: MathLib.js is a JavaScript library for doing mathematical computations in a browser.
library.name: MathLib.js
JSM - JavaScript Matrix library

library.description: Cammy is a versatile 3D projection camera built on top of AngularJS and D3.js.
library.name: Cammy

library.description: A symbolic math parser written in javascript.
library.name: nerdamer

library.description: Math.js is an extensive math library for JavaScript and Node.js. It features a flexible expression parser and offers an integrated solution to work with numbers, big numbers, complex numbers, units, and matrices.
library.name: math.js

library.description: A jQuery plugin for creating web based calculator, it will parse excel-like formula based on predefined cells and values
library.name: jQuery Calx

library.description: A JavaScript library for numerical mathematics: special functions of complex numbers, numerical linear algebra, quadrature, statistical functions and plotting.
library.name: Jmat.js

library.description: Arbitrary precision binary operations library for Javascript.
library.name: funary
